variations.description: Heals all allies for 144% of ATK.
Heals all allies for 168% of ATK.
Heals all allies for 192% of ATK.
Heals all allies for 216% of ATK.
Heals all allies for 240% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 180% of ATK to all enemies and places Brilliance on all allies for 10s. Brilliance: When dealing Physical DMG, inflicts extra Physical DMG equal to 24% of Ruda's ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 210% of ATK to all enemies and places Brilliance on all allies for 10s. Brilliance: When dealing Physical DMG, inflicts extra Physical DMG equal to 28% of Ruda's ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 240% of ATK to all enemies and places Brilliance on all allies for 10s. Brilliance: When dealing Physical DMG, inflicts extra Physical DMG equal to 32% of Ruda's ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies and places Brilliance on all allies for 10s. Brilliance: When dealing Physical DMG, inflicts extra Physical DMG equal to 36% of Ruda's ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 300% of ATK to all enemies and places Brilliance on all allies for 10s. Brilliance: When dealing Physical DMG, inflicts extra Physical DMG equal to 40% of Ruda's ATK.
When using skills, there is a 10% chance to generate 1 Chaos Energy.
When using skills, there is a20% chance to generate 1 Chaos Energy.
